protein.specific_function: Involved in the maturation of Asn-linked oligosaccharides. Trim alpha-1,2-linked mannose residues from Man(9)GlcNAc(2) to produce first Man(8)GlcNAc(2) then Man(6)GlcNAc and a small amount of Man(5)GlcNAc.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on glycosyl bonds

reference.reference_text: Tremblay LO, Herscovics A: Characterization of a cDNA encoding a novel human Golgi alpha 1, 2-mannosidase (IC) involved in N-glycan biosynthesis. J Biol Chem. 2000 Oct 13;275(41):31655-60.
